text: Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nza Fhe Bakɨme nza suaŋgi bigi, ana nta nza muuŋgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza mba nzan fhavi gu ntuu ga mbuim, nta Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzai tɨvi mbatɨgi, nza nta tharga. Nza kɨv rɨvɨv, guigira Fhe Bakɨme piin kɨv, guigira za warir ana nɨɨŋv, zazera tɨvir ŋaarira zɨn ŋgɨrga.
